testcase.classname: Address Management for Billing and Shipping
testcase.name: Add/Edit a Billing address and ensure successful update
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to the application and is redirected to the dashboard.passed When User clicks on the Address menu and navigates to the Billing Address page.passed And User fills in the Billing Address fields with valid data................passed And User clicks the Save Address button.....................................passed Then User should see a confirmation message.................................passed

testcase.classname: Address Management for Billing and Shipping
testcase.name: Add/Edit a Shipping address and ensure successful update
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to the application and is redirected to the dashboard.passed When User clicks on the Address menu and navigates to the Shipping Address page.passed And User fills in the Shipping Address fields with valid data...............passed And User clicks the Save Address button.....................................passed Then User should see the confirmation message...............................passed
